Actions.Name: Time Left
Actions.Tooltip: Time left on the current meeting

Author: Pedro Fuentes ft. MSCRMGuru, damirault
Description:
Display information from your calendar using an iCal URL. Visual cues and a countdown will help you end meetings on time and be ready for the next one. 

This version was built with several fixes and improvements from github community: 
- MSCRMGuru (recurring events fix, https://github.com/MSCRMGuru/stream-deck-ical), 
- damirault (UX improvements, https://github.com/damirault/stream-deck-ical). 

Built by Goshabty (telegram @George785)
Name: iCal [Community Edition]
